theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on specific mtDNA mutational signatures caused by oxidative damage and their accumulation with age.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mtDNA mutations and repair mechanisms influencing aging through oxidative damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes age-dependent accumulation of mtDNA deletions and duplications impairing mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details accumulation of mtDNA mutations and compensatory mtDNA copy number increase due to oxidative damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mtDNA mutation load to cellular senescence and metabolic shifts contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mtDNA deletions and oxidative stress markers accumulating with age in mitochondria.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ROS-induced mtDNA damage, vicious cycle of mutations, and mitochondrial quality control decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Oxidative Mutation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights ROS-induced mtDNA damage and mitochondrial dysfunction in brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS production, oxidative damage to macromolecules, and impaired degradation systems.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mitochondrial ROS as primary aging factor causing mtDNA damage and signaling effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mitochondrial dysfunction and ROS accumulation to age-related physiological decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Correlates low mitochondrial ROS production rates with longevity and reduced oxidative damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes free radical damage to mitochondria, metabolic instability, and oxygen tension effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details mitochondrial dysfunction, ROS accumulation, and feedback loops accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on ROS-driven mitochondrial damage, vicious cycle, and mitophagy regulation by dietary interventions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mitochondrial respiratory chain dysfunction, oxidative stress, and antioxidant defense in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Energy Decline and Cognitive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial energy production decline affecting cognition and systemic health during aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Energy Decline and Cognitive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes decreased mitochondrial gene expression and function as a fundamental aging feature across tissues.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Energy Decline and Cognitive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes decline in mitochondrial mass, function, dynamics, and retrograde signaling in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Energy Decline and Cognitive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details age-related decline in mitochondrial oxidative capacity and biogenesis, and caloric restriction effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Energy Decline and Cognitive Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes organelle degeneration including mitochondria initiates aging and spreads systemic aging signals.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Unfolded Protein Response (UPRmt) Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial unfolded protein response activation as a protective mechanism linked to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Unfolded Protein Response (UPRmt) Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial aspartate transporter distress triggering retrograde signaling and lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial-Lysosomal Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights interplay of mitochondrial damage and lysosomal degradation impairment in postmitotic cell aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Energy Decline and Cognitive Aging Theory
